sections.heading: to this state; apprehension; surrender to local authorities
sections.text: Any such person who shall be captured or arrested by the military forces of such other state while in this state, shall without unnecessary delay be surrendered to the military or police forces of this state to be dealt with according to la

55-215.Fugitive to this state; apprehension; surrender to local authorities.

Any such person who shall be captured or arrested by the military forces of such other state while in this state, shall without unnecessary delay be surrendered to the military or police forces of this state to be dealt with according to law.

SourceLaws 1941, c. 116, ยง 6, p. 449;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 55-406;R.S.1943, ยง 55-215.
